summary: Provides example scripts that demonstrate how to train, evaluate, and run inference with BERT‑based text classification models using NVIDIA NeMo, including support for distributed (model‑parallel) evaluation via Hydra configuration and PyTorch Lightning.
business_intent: Enable data scientists and ML engineers to quickly prototype, benchmark, and deploy scalable text classification solutions with GPU‑accelerated training and evaluation, reducing development time and simplifying model management.
